details.fellowshipSong: It Came upon the Midnight Clear #093

specialMusic.title: Yet Not I, but Through Christ in Me

details.benediction: I Stand Amazed in the Presence #547

list: We are collecting Christmas cards among church members for the Lottie Moon Christmas Offering through Wednesday at 6:00 PM, to hand them out next Sunday. Postage is $0.73 per card; cards can be given to Mike, Brian or Butch. Donations for the big screen are $100, and we need those as soon as possible. They can include either a card or digital picture.
We will pass out Christmas treat bags next Sunday after the morning worship service.
